name: Mission Prisoner Truck 3D
description:
Mission Prisoner Truck 3D!!!
Drive army truck to check post to load the convicts by parking the army van in the highlighted spot. This army truck simulator is very hardcore game because in this game you have to take these notorious fugitives and transferred them to lockups to the warden. Alert your commando unit to gear up for this mission because you have trained them for these kinds of situations.
Features:
Challenging missions with extreme off0road environment.
Drive prisoners truck with extreme tuned driving physics.
Pick up the prisoners & drop them to the army base jail.
Real life law enforcer duty with lots of missions.
Smooth controls, steering & brakes.
